name: Graphic Packaging International, llc
membership:
American Forest & Paper Association
European Carton Makers Association
goal: Graphic Packaging's goals is to understand EU and member country policy and how that policy impacts our company. We want to share information on the impacts to help develop optimal policy.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: Graphic Packaging is a manufacturer and seller of paperboard and paperboard cartons. We are a leader in the US and European market place and the paperboard that we use is both virgin and recycled. We are currently following Mineral Oil regulation in Germany and Biomass Energy policies in the UK and throughout Europe.
